entry.title: Thursday: Snow. High minus 12.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning early this morning. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming east 20 km/h gusting to 40 this morning. High minus 12. Wind chill minus 30 this morning and minus 20 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Thursday 02 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow. Low minus 14.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low minus 14. Wind chill near minus 21. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Thursday 02 March 2023
